they could be recordings of words of comfort from yourself, loved ones or even nature sounds.
we aim to help you with your panic attacks. let\'s quickly walk you through our features.
upload audio clips of words or sounds you would like to hear that soothes you.
during a panic attack, press the panic button to listen to what you have uploaded.
track your progress and share to let others know.
journal your positive experiences and read them whenever you would like.
a daily motivational quote is shared with you to start your everyday.
